name: Chem-Words 5: Advanced Bonding Theories
description:
This application covers 44 terms and diagrams dealing with advanced Bonding Theories and molecular geometry. The terms used in this app are based on the free chemistry e-book from OpenStax.org.  The 44 items are presented in 3 sets.  The first two screens cover the terminology and the last screen covers molecular shapes presented as ball-and-stick drawings. Items covered include sigma and pi bonding, hybrid orbitals, bonding and anti-bonding orbitals, and more. The user must select the term that matches a given  definition. Each word set has a Study Screen for the user to read and review the information. The score is reported as an accuracy of the number of correct answers out of the total answers selected. A “help” button reveals the answer, if needed. This app works fine with Android versions 5.0 through 9.0. This app is offered totally free of charge and does not require a registration. There are no ads and no permissions needed.
The internet is not needed.  This app does not collect any information at all.
It is a free app and is not be sold for profit. Search for “Richard Carman” or "rtcgames" on sites where you find Android apps. Send questions and comments to rtcarman47@ gmail.com
This app will run on Android versions 4 through 10, Windows 7 through 10, and various Linux distros with PlayOnLinux.

Visit OpenStax.org to download FREE textbooks!
